eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction

Class BlockPatternBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction.BlockPatternBuilder

  • public class BlockPatternBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to construct an IBlockPattern.
    See Also:

    Used for {@link MultiblockBuilder#withPattern(IBlockPattern)}.

    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.multiblock.FactoryBlockPattern

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static BlockPatternBuilder start()
        Start an empty builder. Equivalent to FactoryBlockPattern.start(RelativeDirection.RIGHT, RelativeDirection.UP, RelativeDirection.BACK)
        Returns:
        An empty builder.

      • start

        public static BlockPatternBuilder start(ConstantRelativeDirection charDir,
                                        ConstantRelativeDirection stringDir,
                                        ConstantRelativeDirection aisleDir)
        Start an empty builder, defining the directions of the aisle, the strings and the characters used when setting aisles. ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eutropius225/MultiblockTweaker/master/src/main/resources/FactoryBuilderDiagram.png)
        Parameters:
        charDir - The position of each character in a string relative to the one before.
        stringDir - The position of each string in an aisle(String...) call relative to the one before.
        aisleDir - The position of each aisle relative to the one before.
        Returns:
        The empty builder.

      • aisleRepeatable

        public BlockPatternBuilder aisleRepeatable(int minRepeat,
                                           int maxRepeat,
                                           java.lang.String... aisle)
        Add a repeatable aisle.
        Parameters:
        minRepeat - How many times this aisle must be repeated at minimum.
        maxRepeat - How many times this aisle can be repeated at maximum.
        aisle - The aisle pattern. aisle(String...)
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • aisle

        public BlockPatternBuilder aisle(java.lang.String... aisle)
        Add a single aisle.
        Parameters:
        aisle - The aisle pattern. Each unique character in any string must be defined in where(String, IBlockMatcher).
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • setRepeatable

        public BlockPatternBuilder setRepeatable(int minRepeat,
                                         int maxRepeat)
        Makes the previous aisle entered be repeatable. aisleRepeatable(int, int, String...).
        Parameters:
        minRepeat - How many times the aisle must be repeated at minimum.
        maxRepeat - How many times the aisle can be repeated at maximum.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • setRepeatable

        public BlockPatternBuilder setRepeatable(int repeatCount)
        Makes the previous aisle entered be repeatable. aisleRepeatable(int, int, String...). Equivalent to FactoryBlockPattern.setRepeatable(repeatCount, repeatCount).
        Parameters:
        repeatCount - How many times the aisle must be repeated, exactly.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • setAmountLimit

        public BlockPatternBuilder setAmountLimit(java.lang.String symbol,
                                          int minAmount,
                                          int maxLimit)
        Set requirements for a given symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - The symbol defined in where(String, IBlockMatcher)
        minAmount - How many of the symbol-represented blocks must appear at minimum in a valid multiblock.
        maxLimit - How many of the symbol-represented blocks can appear at maximum in a valid multiblock.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • where

        public BlockPatternBuilder where(java.lang.String symbol,
                                 IBlockMatcher blockMatcher)
        Define a symbol. This predicate will be used when checking if the multiblock is valid.
        Parameters:
        symbol - The character that will represent this predicate in aisle(String...) and the other aisle methods.
        blockMatcher - The predicate to match blocks by.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • whereAnd

        public BlockPatternBuilder whereAnd(java.lang.String symbol,
                                    IBlockMatcher first,
                                    IBlockMatcher... matchers)
        Define a symbol. All given predicates must be satisfied.
        Parameters:
        symbol - The character that will represent this predicate in aisle(String...) and the other aisle methods.
        first - The first matcher.
        matchers - The rest of the matchers.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • whereOr

        public BlockPatternBuilder whereOr(java.lang.String symbol,
                                   IBlockMatcher first,
                                   IBlockMatcher... matchers)
        Define a symbol. Any of the given predicates may be satisfied.
        Parameters:
        symbol - The character that will represent this predicate in aisle(String...) and the other aisle methods.
        first - The first matcher.
        matchers - The rest of the matchers.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

        public BlockPatternBuilder validateContext(IMatchValidator validator)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • validateLayer

        public BlockPatternBuilder validateLayer(int layerIndex,
                                         IMatchValidator layerValidator)
        Define a layer match validator, to match a layer as a whole.
        Parameters:
        layerIndex - The index of the layer this should test.
        layerValidator - A predicate to test the full match with.
        Returns:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • build

        public IBlockPattern build()
        Create the IBlockPattern, for use in multiblock creation. Can be called multiple times.
        Returns:
        The built IBlockPattern.
